title: Fifty Shades of Grey : U.S. sales figures in 2012 , by platform
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of copies in millions for 2 number of Copy Types.
The maximum Number of copies in millions 29.0 is found at Copy Type Print and the minimum is found at Digital where Copy Type is 15.0.
The difference of Number of copies in millions between the highest and lowest Copy Type is 14.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Copy Type in the x axis and Number of copies in millions in the y axis.
The Number of copies in millions is highest at Copy Type Print and lowest at Copy Type Digital.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of copies in millions for 2 number of Copy Types.
The maximum Number of copies in millions 29.0 is found at Copy Type Print and the minimum is found at Digital where Copy Type is 15.0.
The difference of Number of copies in millions between the highest and lowest Copy Type is 14.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of copies in millions for 2 number of Copy Types.
The Number of copies in millions is appeared to be the highest at Copy Type Print and lowest at Copy Type Digital.
The highest value at Copy Type Print is 1.93x times more than the lowest value at Digital.
The average Number of copies in millions in all 2 Copy Types is 22.0.
